reviews.review: To take on a project and tell a story of that size was incredible. I loved how it focused on the story of Thanos. Some really emotional parts. Thank you Marvel studios for making this movie. It's something I thought I'd never see.

This film exceeds its over the top expectations. It takes great risks, and manages to give the audience what they want. It is completely original, and marvel+Russo brothers have made a non-formulated film. We explore the bad guy more than the good, and it is written in a way that you understand his burden to believe what he "needs" to do is right. This film is tremendously unexpected, and no film to date has accomplished all of these feats.

The very fact that this movie has come after 15 interlinked Marvel successful movies before shows how carefully this was planned and to say the least, a successful execution indeed. It is definitely not easy to have so many superheroes in one movie sharing screen times in such way that no one steals other's thunder and this has been done remarkably in this movie. A strong villain is the main key to any movie and Thanos has been superbly portrayed as one. Looking forward for the final conclusion next year !

This movie. Is. Freaking. Amazing. This film echoes brilliance in every category. Storytelling. Visual effects. And most importantly emotion. This movie handles fight scenes and character interactions so well it's like it's right out of the comics. This film will leave a lasting impact on you long after you leave the theatre and is satisfying despite its bitter appearance. This movie is funny as hell and knows exactly when to switch to drama that puts you on edge. It's brutal nature is established from the start and keeps you on edge till the very end, where it pays off in a bittersweet finale. Only gripe, and it is a minor one, is its constant cuttting back and forth can be somewhat difficult to keep track of. Despite this, it is a phenomenal film that everyone should witness.
Too many characters, too little story, too much violence to make this film worthwhile.

So many great elements in this film, it well deserves its hype. Not my favorite film in the MCU, as it leaves a bitter taste in the mouth toward the end, but as that was the goal, it was achieved very well. Logan (the film) reminded people that heroes can die, and this film took that concept up to 11. Most of my predictions were busted up, and the film delivered on a villain that truly gave the MCU a deep sense of dread that had yet to be felt by any other.
It was one of the best Marvel movies. It took chances and it will not go as you expect.

What an incredible ride!  It didn't go how I thought it would and left me wondering what is going to happen in part 2. The twists and turns in this kept me on my seat and enjoyable the whole way through.
